attributes.additional_details: Due to the amazing work of all of our front line staff, I believe as a gesture of goodwill and as a thank you for continuing their hard work during the  Covid19 outbreak that each and every nurse of should have their student fees wiped clean.  Remember, these amazing people are selflessly putting themselves and their loved ones at risk with their continued work in order to keep others safe.
attributes.background: To ease the normal financial pressures that nurses and other staff face due to the student loans these amazing people were forced to take out in order to fulfil their dreams of helping

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732
